ruleContent.content:
<js>
var url = getUrl().replace(/\/$/,'')
//java.log(url)
//å¤„ç†å¼ºåˆ¶ç™»å½•
var nn = String(cookie.getCookie(url));
var coks = nn.split('; '); 
ckk = coks.filter(item => !item 
.startsWith("lf_reader_num")).join('; ');
cookie.setCookie(url,ckk);

//è‡ªåŠ¨å¤„ç†éªŒè¯
let html = src;

function txt(sr) {
    let text;
    if (src.includes("æ»‘åŠ¨éªŒè¯")) {
        let headers = {
             'User-Agent': "Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/58.0.3029.110 Safari/537.36",
            "Referer": baseUrl
        };
        try {
            let s = src.match(/src=\"(\/huadong[^"]+)/)[1];
            let sr = java.get(url + s, headers).body()
            eval(sr.match(/(key=\".+?,value=\"[^;]+?\;)/)[1]);
            let va = getval(value);
            let codeul = url + sr.match(/([^"]+yanzheng_huadong\.php[^"]+)/)[1] + `${key}&value=${va}`;
            let ck = java.get(codeul, headers);
            java.log("éªŒè¯Cookieï¼š" + JSON.stringify(ck.cookies()));
            java.toast("æ£€æµ‹åˆ°éªŒè¯,å°è¯•è‡ªåŠ¨å¤„ç†â€¦â€¦");
            let tx = java.ajax(baseUrl);
            html = tx;
            text = java.getString('.read-content@html', tx);
        } catch (error) {
            java.log(error);
            text = "è‡ªåŠ¨éªŒè¯å¤±è´¥ï¼Œè¯·é‡è¯•!";
        }
    } else {
        text = java.getString('.read-content@html', src);
    }
    return text;
}

let text = txt(html);

//å¤„ç†é‡æ–°è·å–æ–‡æœ¬æ—¶å¯èƒ½ä¼šå‡ºç°çš„é”™è¯¯ã€‚
let retryCount = 0;
const maxRetries = 3;
let result;
while (retryCount < maxRetries) {
    if (text != false && text !== "") {
        result = text;
        break;
    } else {
        retryCount++;
        text = txt(html);
        Packages.java.lang.Thread.sleep(400);
        java.toast(`æœªè·å–åˆ°æ–‡æœ¬ï¼Œæ­£åœ¨é‡è¯•...ï¼ˆå½“å‰ç¬¬${retryCount}æ¬¡é‡è¯•ï¼‰`);
    }
}

if (retryCount === maxRetries) {
    result = "é‡è¯•ä¸‰æ¬¡ä»ç„¶æœªè·å–åˆ°æ–‡æœ¬ï¼Œè¯·æ£€æŸ¥ç½‘ç»œçŠ¶å†µã€‚"
}
result;
</js>

<js>
function setArgument(key, value) {
    let open_argument = source.getVariable();
    open_argument = getArguments(open_argument,'');
    open_argument[key] = value;
    open_argument = JSON.stringify(open_argument);
    source.setVariable(open_argument);
    return open_argument;
}

function gets_key() {
    var servers = String(source.bookSourceUrl);
    const serverList = servers.split('\n');
    
    for (let server of serverList) {
        let keys = String(cookie.getCookie(server)) || String(java.getCookie(server));
        if (keys) {
            let keyParts = keys.split('secretKey=');
            if (keyParts.length > 1) {
                keys = keyParts[keyParts.length - 1];
                setArgument('key', keys);
                return keys;
            }
        }
    }
    return '';  
 }

let open_argument = source.getVariable();
let base_url = getArguments(open_argument,'server');
let ms = getArguments(open_argument,'tone_id');
let key = getArguments(open_argument,'key');
if (!key) {
	key = gets_key();
	}

const groupDatas = [];
let infoData = [];
function deviceType() {
  try {
    return!!java.androidId();
  } catch (e) {
    return false;
  }
}
let device = deviceType()? 'android' : 'ios';
if (device == 'android' && (get_key(String(cookie.getCookie('fanqienovel.com') || java.getCookie('fanqienovel.com'))))) {
    function groupQuery() {
        const url = base_url + "/group_name?cookie={{get_key(String(cookie.getCookie('fanqienovel.com') || java.getCookie('fanqienovel.com')))}}";
        const res = java.ajax(url);
        const data = JSON.parse(res).data;

        data.forEach(group => {
            let key;
            for (key in group) {
                groupDatas.push({
                    "title": key,
                    "url": base_url +"/bookshelf2?page={{page}}&book_ids=" + group[key].join(","),
                    "style": {
                        "layout_flexGrow": 1,
                        "layout_flexBasisPercent": 0.45
                    }
                });
            }
        });

        if (groupDatas.length % 2 !== 0) {
            groupDatas.push({
                "title": "--",
                "url": "",
                "style": {
                    "layout_flexGrow": 1,
                    "layout_flexBasisPercent": 0.45
                }
            });
        }
    }

    try {
    	java.longToast("è¯·ç¨ç­‰,æ­£åœ¨æ›´æ–°åˆ†ç»„æ•°æ®!");
    // ç”¨æˆ·ä¿¡æ¯
    const userUrl = base_url + '/fquser?sessionid={{String(cookie.getKey("fanqienovel.com", "sessionid"))}}';
    const userRes = java.ajax(userUrl);
    const userInfo = JSON.parse(userRes).data.name;

    infoData = [
        {
            "title": `${userInfo}ä¸ªäººä¸­å¿ƒ`,
            "url": "",
            "style": {
                "layout_flexGrow": 1,
                "layout_flexBasisPercent": 1
            }
        }
    ];
    groupQuery();
    } catch (e) {
    java.longToast("ç½‘ç»œé”™è¯¯æˆ–ç™»å½•å¤±æ•ˆæˆ–é˜…è¯»ç‰ˆæœ¬è¿‡ä½ï¼Œè¯·é‡æ–°ç™»å½•ç•ªèŒ„é‡è¯•ï¼");

}

<js>
var toUrl = baseUrl
if(baseUrl.includes("data:;base64")){
toUrl=java.hexDecodeToString(result)
}
result=java.get(getRealyUrl(toUrl),{}).body()
if(!String(result)){
var option = {
    "method": "GET",
    "webView":true
};
result=java.ajax(getRealyUrl(toUrl)+","+ JSON.stringify(option))
}

result = decodeLatin1ToUtf8(org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(result).html())
</js>

@js:
var list = [], last = book.latestChapterTitle;
if(/json$/i.test(baseUrl)){
	try{
		var _$ = JSON.parse(src),
   items = _$.items, aid = _$.aid;
    for(let $ of items){
	   let name = $.n, cid = $.cid;
	   link = `/r/${aid}/${cid}.html`;
	   dir = ({text: name, href: link});
   	list.push(dir);
     	}
		 }catch(err){
			java.log("jsonç›®å½•è§£æå¤±è´¥ï¼š" + err)
			}
	}else if( result[0] && 
		/li.*data-num/.test(result) //æµ‹è¯•é¡ºåº
		//|| result[0].text().indexOf(last) > -1
		){ //å¤„ç†ç›®å½•ï¼ŒæŒ‰é¡ºåºé‡æ–°æ’åº
		sort = Array.from(result).sort((a, b) => a.attr("data-num") - b.attr("data-num"));
		list = sort.map(x => x.select("a")[0] );
